website_summaries.verdict: The HP Scanjet Pro 3000 s2 Sheet-feed Scanner is a little slow, but it delivers easy one-step scanning to destinations ranging from Word documents to email to the cloud.
pros: Allows one-step scans to a variety of formats including image PDF, searchable PDF, and Word documents
cons: Image processing adds substantial time to the raw scan speed, even for scanning to image PDF format

customer_reviews.title: HP scanjet 3000s gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: HP scanjet 3000s takes care of our needs in an office setting. We scan all documents for storage and this gem makes it an easy task. Currently have 12 at workstations throughout the office. Price point is great for desktop use. We have a larger scanner in the copy room for the big jobs with hundreds of pages. Very reliable, with only occasional cleaning of glass plate and rollers needed to keep things rolling along. I've noticed if a staff member likes to use White-out to make corrections before scanning, it will sometimes get white flecks on glass plate, using a little windex, it comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: JParizona

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This is not a "pro" level scanner. Scanning documents as .pdfs gives very poor quality. To get decent - not great - quality documents you need to scan as a .tiff and later convert it to .pdf. Big disappointment. Scanning photos is a joke. Don't bother. It is small and fast, so that's good. But not up to normal HP quality. The software is pathetic and the "manual" is worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... scanner because I used it at work and I love the features and the software
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner because I used it at work and I love the features and the software. I have Windows 10 at home and the software for this machine is NOT Windows 10 compatible. I contacted HP and they did a work around where I can use existing Windows set up to run the machine, but that totally defeats the reason I bought the machine, which was to use the HP software to do the scanning. Not happy. Most likely will return because of the software issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner and great replacement for our Fujitsu 6110s at half the price. I scan between 50 and 100 pages a day and have had this scanner for about a month. I've only had 1 paper jam in that time. We were looking for a cheaper replacement as our Fujitsus are nearing 2 years old. The software was very easy to setup and with the twain driver, it works great with our eagent software. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T. Berger

customer_reviews.title: I like the scanner
customer_reviews.text: I like the scanner. I don't like the documentation or absence of "quick-start" instructions. Probably a good idea to know something about scanners before you tackle the similarities between the "scan" program and their "read iris" program. And if you load their "paper port" software you will be hounded each time you log-on to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: It's compactness and relative ease of use makes it a good buy. The interface with my computer is great
customer_reviews.text: This is without doubt the easiest scanner I've used. However, I wouldn't put more than a dozen pages in at a time. It seems to get jammed with any more than that. So if feeding large projects in smaller batches bothers you, this isn't the scanner for you. It's compactness and relative ease of use makes it a good buy. The interface with my computer is great. Scan gets sent to exactly where I want it. Being able to correct orientation and scanning two sides is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great at the office! Love that it scans quickly, occasionally will jam when it grabs more than one sheet but doesn't happen often. Really need one at home as well to get all my files scanned & stored electronically.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Paper Feed Error/ No support
customer_reviews.text: Unit broke in 90 days has 1 yr warranty and company offers no support and will not stand by their warranty..DO NOT BUY from them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Giordano

customer_reviews.title: We love this scanner
customer_reviews.text: We love this scanner. Its the fastest one we've had. Very good feed that never jams or pulls more than one sheet. We did have difficulty loading the drivers, but no problems since then. Small profile that doesn't take up much room. Very light, almost to the point of flimsy, but its been durable so far. We will probably by a second one for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: device seems fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with instructions that are poorly configured, parts are mentioned that don't exist such as a light on the power supply. The power supply besides was defective but rather than go through the return hassle i just ordered a new supply. device seems fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Fast, but jams about every 5 or so uses ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast, but jams about every 5 or so uses. I have learned to manipulate feeds to help avoid jams.
customer_reviews.author: Tandra Freed

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a couple different departments to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a couple different departments to use and they are both really liking it. The software included with it can scan to searchable PDF's which one of the departments really likes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Came with all accessories, disc, etc. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: ... of these in my pharmacy - very reliable and easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: I use several of these in my pharmacy - very reliable and easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Feely

customer_reviews.title: Scanner works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The scanner arrived on time and works perfectly. The only thing I didn't realize is that I can't name the file until after I've scanned it to a file. They all come up Scan-01. It's just extra work on my part and my last scanner gave you the option to name the file prior to scanning but that was my fault for not investigating more. The scanner is fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Shelton

customer_reviews.title: This one is perfect and thanks for all your help in me returning ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for helping me with me trying to order the scanner. This one is perfect and thanks for all your help in me returning the one that would not work with out network.
customer_reviews.author: Janice P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little work horse! Scans double sided just scans very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Most of our staff of 70 uses ScanSnap scanners. We bought 4 of these HP scanners as a trial. They are the most reviled scanners in the office. We literally have staff members in tears using these. No configuration of HP Easy Scan settings will solve this scanners many shortcomings. All 4 are now collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: William Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: The PDF is too small and easy jam the paper
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is very slow performance compare with Epson Ds550 I bought 3 years ago. The PDF is too small and easy jam the paper. I like HP product very much ( the HP printer) but very frustrate with this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: kim ng.

customer_reviews.title: nice feature where input and output trays fold over unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit takes up small footprint; nice feature where input and output trays fold over unit as a type of dust cover and decreases footprint. Quickly feeds numerous pages. In several days use only encountered around two feed issues due to folds or wrinkles in paper. Nice feature where it quickly detects double sided pages. Scanning software included is a nice and much faster version of earlier software I had experience with on one of HP's flat bed scanners. Overall, quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scanner - very quick - cool looking and well built
customer_reviews.text: The HP Scanjet 3000s2 is compact and fast. There were not any reviews on Amazon or HP. I purchased it based on HP name and because it was reasonably priced. I had it installed and had the 10 or 12 documents on my desk scanned and electronically filed in less than an hour. The Nuance software is simple and lets me make and organize the files the way that I want. Now I need to roll up my sleeves and start scanning some of my older documents so that I can get rid of my paper files.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: we bought two in November and I already broken in six month. I don't know if they would fix it
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lemper

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th scanjet 3000s2, and as long as I get this one, we are fine. It scans multiple sheets into single files, which is important to us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Scans quickly and no paper jams or problems yet. I have scanned about 900 pages so far. No complaints. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Combe

customer_reviews.title: scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works fine probably me but I can not get the auto power off to quit working. great product would buy again
customer_reviews.author: racespec

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: A Great, light weight, very mobile, scanner at 1/3 the size & 2/3rds the price of the HP scanjet 5000
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOW COST OPTION FOR SCANNER
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS TO REPLACE A SNAPSCAN THAT HAD BROKEN AFTER 6 MONTHS. SO FAR IT HAS EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS, IT IS TWAIN COMPLIANT WHICH THE SNAPSCAN WASNT. THE ONLY ISSUE I HAVE HAD IS IF YOU TRY TO SCAN MORE THAN ABOUT 15 PAGES IT PULLS TOO MANY AT A TIME. FOR MY LIGHT BUSINESS USE IT WORKS GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great Space-saving idea that still scans and functions well !
customer_reviews.text: This Scanner is a Great way to keep a lightly used (for us) piece of office equipment from cluttering desk space. We also use a table with a Fax machine, Printer (b/w only) and a Color Inkjet Printer. Occasionally we need to scan documents, brochures, invoices etc, so there was a need for a quality scanner, but not much room. This scanner fits the bill wonderfully, it operates quickly and effectively, quietly and shuts itself off. I was familiar with Nuance Software already, so it was easy for me, but it was also easy for the others in the office. It works fine with our 3 operating systems used here, Windows XP, Windows Vista and Win 7. **** Jim
customer_reviews.author: WhippetRun

customer_reviews.title: I have a lesser scanner of which I'm not happy with, and am severely paying for in terms ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lesser scanner of which I'm not happy with, and am severely paying for in terms of lackluster performance. Don't get me wrong the scanner I have is a pretty good scanner, if you want jpgs Only. I'm interested in a small scanner footprint, which this one is; a searchable PDF, being able to save in different formats, i.e,: WORD, Excel, PDF, jpg's if necessary, and I'd also like to use a more high end scanner software. I get all of those capabilities with the HP ScanJet 3000s2 Document Scanner, thank you HP
customer_reviews.author: The McDaddy

customer_reviews.title: I like the Neat software better
customer_reviews.text: I had the Neat system prior to getting this. It has been a difficult adjustment for me. I like the Neat software better. This scanner is a better quality. It is very clear and fast. It suits my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J

customer_reviews.title: Good document scanner that doesn't take up much desk space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good document scanner. It doesn't take up much desk space. It automatically goes into "sleep" mode after not being used for a little while, which helps conserve energy. We quickly scanned many important documents and then saved them to our cloud account (so that they could be retrieved remotely). Really like this scanner. It is not meant for scanning photos.
customer_reviews.author: MomtoBoys

customer_reviews.title: STILL overly complicated and cranky STILL ridiculously poor software and software compatibility with
customer_reviews.text: I had TWO of the predecessors to this one, and trust me, they haven't improved it much over the last 10 years!!!!!!! STILL overly complicated and cranky STILL ridiculously poor software and software compatibility with.....most everything. Especially MAC. (Don't even think about it...) WILL work if you baby it, unlike its predecessor which HP Support at the time told me finally to, "Give up. Save yourself." I still have them around here somewhere......mighty big doorstops Crap, crap and crap
customer_reviews.author: marc bauder

product_meta.title: HP ScanJet Professional 3000s2 Sheet-feed Scanner (L2737A)
product_meta.description: Turn the page on your paper-intensive processes. Save time with smart, reliable scanning that's easy to integrate and adds efficiency to any office. Count on clear, legible results from a compact scanner designed to help save energy.
feature_bullets: Turn piles of paper into business productivity. Quickly store and share your scanned files with ease-send directly to cloud storage or a SharePoint site.

Breeze through processes with fast scan speeds and a 50-page automatic feeder. Turn files into editable text. Save time with automatic two-sided scanning. Reliably handle a variety of paper types, thicknesses, and sizes.

Put smart, convenient scanning to work for you. Save time and skip steps with HP Easy Scan. Create quick shortcuts to help add efficiency to your business. Accurately capture the right results with auto-scan mode, crop, and color detection. Create PDFs with a touch.

Easily store and share scanned files. Convert scanned files into several output formats with HP Easy Scan. Seamlessly add high-volume scanning to existing processes through TWAIN, ISIS, WIA and Mac drivers.

Count on the right result, right when you want it. Avoid missing pages in scanned files—HP EveryPage Ultrasonic feeds one page at a time and auto-aligns. Produce sharp, legible results with the ability to scan at 600-dpi resolution.
Rely on a scanner that just won’t quit—scan up to 1000 pages per day. Preserve workspace with a compact device that fits in around the office—close at hand or out of the way.

Conserve resources without sacrificing performance. Start fast and move on. Instant-on Technology lets you begin scanning quickly from low-power mode. Help save energy costs with HP Auto-Off Technology—schedule your device to turn off when you don't need it.
One-year limited hardware warranty; 24-hour, 7 days a week Web support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars71 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
